ygData.subject: Gnome in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Today I was in freeport and talked to the gnome merchents in the Emporium next to the bank in North Freeport named Svinal Wyspin.  I couldn t get any
ygData.messageBody:
Today I was in freeport and talked to the gnome merchents in the Emporium
next to the bank in North Freeport named Svinal Wyspin. I couldn't get any
information from him, but he does respond to a Hail (unlike most merchents)
and that usually means they have something to interact with. He basically
said Welcome to the Emporium if we don't have what you want, we can get it.
Well I wish he could get me a tinkering book. :) Anyone ever get any other
information from him? Is he involved in a quest?

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
